name: John Bratline
description:
I am a healthy, fit, open minded, and optimistic man that smiles and laughs as often as possible. I enjoy conversations that have depth, meeting new people, occasionally dancing the night away, and staying home while watching a good movie. I consider family and friends to be but a single family and I love them dearly. I hope to travel more when time permits, have deeper understandings of people, cultures, and of course myself. It’s important to continue to better myself everyday.
I’m a passionate sports fan that enjoys a cold beer just as much as a good red wine, must be the Italian in me ;-). Oh yeah, I also like food which includes cooking on the grill. I study philosophy, history, enjoy singing a good song and spending time in nature when the temperature outside isn’t as hot as the surface of the sun.
Some would say that i’m a good listener and am always interested in learning more about people. Being affectionate and compassionate are important aspects of myself and yes, that includes cuddling
